title: Why Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott Are Spending More Time Together Despite Being Broken Up
text:
From ELLE

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott are no longer a romantic item, but that hasn’t stopped them from spending time together. Scott is currently recovering from a knee injury and occasionally staying over at the “Rise and Shine” star’s home with their daughter, Stormi. He recently fell during a performance in New York, even telling the crowd, “I ain’t gonna lie, I think I just like, broke my knee right now.”

“It’s not anything new that they spend a lot of time together,” a source told People. “Even after they decided to take a break, they still spent time together with Stormi. And Travis was always free to come and go at Kylie’s so he can see Stormi,” the source explains. “Now when he isn’t working, his free time is all about Stormi. Kylie and Travis always had fun co-parenting, but you can tell that Kylie is happy Travis isn’t working right now. She is happy that he is around.”

It’s been clear via social media that the former couple is on good terms. Jenner recently posted a video of her playing Stormi a remix of her viral “Rise and Shine” riff, which prompted her daughter to ask for her dad’s music instead.

“Daddy’s girl,” Jenner wrote along with two eye roll emojis and a heart eyes emoji.

The source also hinted at the possibility of reconciliation between Jenner and Scott.

“He still might need knee surgery in L.A. and then he will recover at Kylie’s too,” the source added. “And as special holidays are coming up, they will continue to spend a lot of time together. They both seem great together. There is definitely hope things will work out.”









You Might Also Like
description: The former couple have been hanging out as of late.
